name: Ian
text: Hello, traveler! You must be TERRA.

name: Ian
text: I’m Ian, and I could really use your help

name: Ian
text: Asia is facing some serious climate challenges!
Responses: Tell me more—I’m here to help!

name: Ian
text: Well, for starters, our air is getting harder to breathe.

name: Ian
text: Did you know that Asia is home to over half the world’s population?

name: Ian
text: That means more factories, more vehicles, and sadly, more CO2 emissions

name: Ian
text: The forests that once absorbed all this carbon are disappearing fast!
Responses: What can we do to fix it?

name: Ian
text: We need to plant trees like bamboo or mangroves, they're amazing at capturing CO2!

name: Ian
text: And with so much sunlight here, we can set up solar energy farms to reduce reliance on coal.
Responses: How many trees should we plant for it to make a difference?

name: Ian
text: Great question! If we plant 99 bamboo trees,

name: Ian
text: or 16 wind turbines

name: Ian
text: or set up 71 small solar panels

name: Ian
text: each will help reduce CO2 in a unique way.

name: Ian
text: Which one would you like to work on first?

name: Ian
text: I love it!

name: Ian
text: 99 bamboo trees can absorb approximately 25 tons of CO2 annually,

name: Ian
text: and they grow quickly, making an immediate impact.

name: Ian
text: Here are some seeds, go to the building in front of which you arrived here

name: Ian
text: You will only be able to plant them there.

name: Ian
text: end

name: Ian
text: Great choice!

name: Ian
text: 16 wind turbines can absorb around 75 tons of CO2 annually,

name: Ian
text: However they are very costly to make

name: Ian
text: be it to your wallet or the environment

name: Ian
text: Nevertheless, go to the the top left of here, you will be able to place them there.

name: Ian
text: The area you are going to should be grey of full of dead grass. Good luck.

name: Ian
text: end

name: Ian
text: Fantastic!

name: Ian
text: 71 solar panels can reduce CO2 emissions by approximately 100 tons annually

name: Ian
text: depending on their size and efficiency.

name: Ian
text: Plus, they provide clean energy for the future!

name: Ian
text: Go through the door above me, it will bring you to the roof of that building.

name: Ian
text: There, you will be able to place the solar panels down

name: Ian
text: end

name: Ian
text: Is there something else you want to try and do to save the planet Terra?

name: Ian
text: Good luck, TERRA! Every step you take brings us closer to a healthier planet. Let’s get started!
